snippet: Richard Schulze, the founder and owner of 20 percent of Minnesota-based Best Buy, has made a preliminary offer to take the electronics chain private. But the board holds all the cards, thanks to Minnesota law.
abstract: Richard Schulze, the founder and owner of 20 percent of Minnesota-based Best Buy, has made a preliminary offer to take the electronics chain private. But the board holds all the cards, thanks to Minnesota law.

headline.main: Minnesota Minefield for a Best Buy Deal
